home.legend: We help to build the next generations of the technology.
home.description_title: Drive innovation and advance AI field
home.first_paragraph: We aim to democratize artificial intelligence by educating the public on the subject, in order to reduce the number of ignorant people in the field of technology. Through knowledge sharing and community involvement, we can make AI technology open to a wider range of people and thus enhance its development.
home.second_paragraph: We initiate the community, by making available to it: articles, videos, projects, etc., looks like technology. Our content aims to create, train and educate the next generation of technology.
